column1: masterchef australia is all cute and cuddly and absolutely adorable while masterchef us is edgy and like that one kid who swears a mile a minute.
and then you have masterchef india which is more melodramatic than the most melodramatic movie you can think of. and then some.
So when can I cook at the level of Gordon Ramsay? :(
Masterchef’s Mega Week starts tonight, why am I so excited omg
I just wish there was an endless supply of new masterchef episodes.
Wait is anyone else watching masterchef right now?
